name: Henry J. MILLER, III, Administrator of the Estate of Peter M. Miller, Deceased, Respondent v. COMMUNITY HEALTH SYSTEMS, INC., Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Miller v. Community Health Systems, Inc.

parties: Henry J. MILLER, III, Administrator of the Estate of Peter M. Miller, Deceased, Respondent v. COMMUNITY HEALTH SYSTEMS, INC., Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
Petition for Review
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of June, 2008, the Petition for Review and the Application for Stay are hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
951 A.2d 263
Henry J. MILLER, III, Administrator of the Estate of Peter M. Miller, Deceased, Respondent v. COMMUNITY HEALTH SYSTEMS, INC., Petitioner.
No. 206 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 25, 2008.
